content: hi welcome to made with love by daisy in this video i will be showing you how i made these pretty semi circle crochet earrings with a bead dangle you may sell the items made from this pattern but please tag me in your pics and credit me as designer list of crochet supplies anchor pearl cotton thread crochet hook 0 85 mm scissors sewing needle list of jewellery supplies 2 fish earring hooks 2 jump rings 2 beads of your choice jump ring opener optional jewellery pliers note my beads had a small loop on it so i could just add it to the jump ring in case yours does not have that you will need to add your beads to head pins before you can use them if you have any questions about the pattern slide in my dms happy hooking daisy
